LABEL: 0x483
STRING: I can hear the sough of the wind.

LABEL: 0x4B2
STRING: Is this outside?

LABEL: 0x4E1
STRING: Am I finally out?

LABEL: 0x52C
STRING: Open your eyes.

LABEL: 0x567
STRING: ...Do you see? Isn't the sky beautiful?

LABEL: 0x5B1
STRING: A blue sky overlooks the field of flowers beyond me.

LABEL: 0x604
STRING: Hey. Isn't this a wonderful world? This world is so beautiful.

LABEL: 0x671
STRING: This flower garden was planted for someone - it's a place where flowers that each person has made bloom for someone gather.

LABEL: 0x6EE
STRING: They might be for you, or maybe they're for me.

LABEL: 0x755
STRING: Or... perhaps they're for someone else. They may be for someone who isn't here.

LABEL: 0x7C2
STRING: You, too, should try growing some flowers.

LABEL: 0x813
STRING: Flowers can bloom completely differently depending on who raised them.

LABEL: 0x876
STRING: I wonder - what color will your flowers be?

LABEL: 0x8D2
STRING: We are such selfish, heartless beings...

LABEL: 0x924
STRING: We commit many sins, without even realizing what we've done.

LABEL: 0x97A
STRING: We know that violence hurts others.

LABEL: 0x9D6
STRING: We know that cruel words hurt others.

LABEL: 0xA2C
STRING: Everyone knows this, and yet, we pretend we do not.

LABEL: 0xA84
STRING: The more we sin and justify our actions, the more comfortable we are to continue.

LABEL: 0xAE9
STRING: We feel we are the victims.

LABEL: 0xB22
STRING: No one realizes that they are no saints, either.

LABEL: 0xB6A
STRING: We are such selfish, egotistical creatures.

LABEL: 0xBC1
STRING: ...But you already know this, don't you?

LABEL: 0xC0B
STRING: We live in a world where even the saying of 'I love you' is both distorted and twisted.

LABEL: 0xC73
STRING: ...What a cruel and unreasonable world.

LABEL: 0xD2A
STRING: There isn't much to say about me.

LABEL: 0xD60
STRING: No dreams, no hopes, no money, no power, no talent, no family, no friends, no lovers...

LABEL: 0xDC4
STRING: There's nothing much to say. I'm just a typical, boring guy.

LABEL: 0xE17
STRING: I'm taking the usual way home.

LABEL: 0xE50
STRING: What will I be thinking as I walk here tomorrow?

LABEL: 0xEA2
STRING: Surely tomorrow will be better than today, but there's no real guarantee that things will improve.

LABEL: 0xEF7
STRING: This is just how my life is.

LABEL: 0xF32
STRING: Nothing ever changes. I hope for something to break the monotony, but nothing ever does.

LABEL: 0xF87
STRING: Every time there's...

LABEL: 0xFC8
STRING: nothing.

LABEL: 0xFF6
STRING: I continue to walk in silence.

LABEL: 0x1025
STRING: Home isn't far now, and I'm starting to get sleepy.

LABEL: 0x1076
STRING: I keep walking along, until I notice something.

LABEL: 0x10AA
STRING: I look down and see a flower by my feet.

LABEL: 0x10F4
STRING: It is a young flower that has not fully bloomed.

LABEL: 0x1139
STRING: Much like myself.

LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: I'm just a nobody, who hasn't even accomplished anything.

LABEL: 0x11AA
STRING: Just a life that floats back and forth along the same path.

LABEL: 0x11FE
STRING: As for the flower...

LABEL: 0x1234
STRING: It is much like myself, hesitant to bloom in full.

LABEL: 0x128E
STRING: The flower appears to be......

LABEL: 0x135B
STRING: Jasmine.

LABEL: 0x138B
STRING: These flowers possess a sensual fragrence and beauty, easily charming those who see them.

LABEL: 0x13F2
STRING: But at the end of its road of grace, eventually...

LABEL: 0x1431
STRING: it will bloom into a flower filled with true love.

LABEL: 0x14AF
STRING: Hydrangea.

LABEL: 0x14DF
STRING: Well suited to rain, this flower will change its color in various ways throughout its life...

LABEL: 0x154B
STRING: ...much like the chaotic mind of an unstable person.

LABEL: 0x159B
STRING: But at the end of its road of desire, eventually... it will bloom into a flower filled with poison.

LABEL: 0x1639
STRING: Daffodil.

LABEL: 0x1669
STRING: This is a flower filled with confidence and ruthlessness. It uses its beauty to ensnare its prey.

LABEL: 0x16D9
STRING: But at the end of its road of bloodthirst, eventually... it will bloom into a flower filled with foolishness.

LABEL: 0x1777
STRING: Ivy.

LABEL: 0x17A7
STRING: A fairly standoffish flower, it lives a quiet life in its search for eternal love.

LABEL: 0x181B
STRING: At the end of its road of gloom, eventually... it will bloom into a flower filled with happiness.

LABEL: 0x18B9
STRING: Anemone.

LABEL: 0x18E9
STRING: This colorful and lovely flower taste the pain of love before meeting a fleeting end.

LABEL: 0x1957
STRING: At the end of that road of hope, eventually... it will bloom into a flower filled with despair.
